content:
What it Took To Build This

  • Technology

    • Queued System that is scalable
    • HA solutions with failover
    • Automate everything
    • Authenticate as much as possible
    • 24x7 NOC to detect/fix failures as they occur

  • 200MB of bandwidth

  • 200 Engineers/Operations to support it
